H0.text: Barometer helps people understand what makes up white light.

H1.text: Prism helps people understand what makes up white light.

H2.text: A microscope helps people understand what makes up white light.

H3.text: Thermometer helps people understand what makes up white light.

A4.text: A dispersive prism can be used to break white light up into its constituent spectral colors (the colors of the rainbow) to form a spectrum
